<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1946</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Child Abuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kindesmißbrauch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Abus d'Enfant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abuso De Criança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abuso Di Bambino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κακοποίηση παιδιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Abuso De Niño</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for advanced English students on the topic of Child abuse The students read about the subject and do a few related. writing activities</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">child abuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für hochentwickelte 
englische Kursteilnehmer auf dem Thema des Kindesmißbrauches, den die
Kursteilnehmer über das Thema lesen und einige in Verbindung stehende
Schreiben Aktivitäten tun</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais avançés sur le sujet de l'abus d'enfant que les 
étudiants ont connaissance du sujet et font quelques activités 
relatives d'écriture</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para estudantes
ingleses avançados no tópico do abuso que de criança os estudantes 
lêem sobre o assunto e fazem algumas atividades relacionadas da 
escrita</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli allievi
inglesi avanzati sul soggetto di abuso che di bambino gli allievi 
leggono sull'oggetto e che fanno alcune attività relative di 
scrittura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους προηγμένους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές στο θέμα του παιδιού κάνει
κακή χρήση των σπουδαστών που διαβάζονται για το θέμα και κάνει 
μερικές σχετικές δραστηριότητες γραψίματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses avanzados en el asunto del abuso de niño que los
estudiantes leen sobre el tema y que hacen algunas actividades 
relacionadas de la escritura</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kindesmißbrauch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">abus d'enfant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">abuso de criança</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abuso di bambino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κακοποίηση παιδιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">abuso de niño</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
